info.name: Dameng Database - Detect
author: pussycat0x
info.description: The Dameng (DMDB) Protocol Enumerator is a lightweight network reconnaissance tool designed to identify and fingerprint Dameng Database (DM/DM7/DM8) servers using their native wire-protocol.

response:
HTTP/1.1 400 Content-Type: text/html;charset=utf-8 Content-Language: en Content-Length: 2921 Date: Sat, 28 Feb 2026 20:48:27 GMT Connection: close HTTP Status 400 – Bad Request

HTTP Status 400 – Bad Request

Type Exception Report

Message Invalid character found in method name [0x000x000x000x000xc80x00Q0x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x990x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x010x020x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x080x000x000x008.1.1.490x00@0x000x000x000x060x81I0xbb0xe00x040xa6/0xb4UR0x830x170x040xc80x020xd40xd80x020xb4W0x9c0xb0E0xb30xc60x100x080x80r^0xce0xcf0x140x8a|0x920x050x04|0xac0xca0xdf0xef_0xf2dF0x0d0x110x09*;H;0xf90xd2C0x820xde0xa10xdcC0xe7...]. HTTP method names must be tokens

Description The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, invalid request message framing, or deceptive request routing).

Exception

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Invalid character found in method name [0x000x000x000x000xc80x00Q0x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x990x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x010x020x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x000x080x000x000x008.1.1.490x00@0x000x000x000x060x81I0xbb0xe00x040xa6/0xb4UR0x830x170x040xc80x020xd40xd80x020xb4W0x9c0xb0E0xb30xc60x100x080x80r^0xce0xcf0x140x8a|0x920x050x04|0xac0xca0xdf0xef_0xf2dF0x0d0x110x09*;H;0xf90xd2C0x820xde0xa10xdcC0xe7...]. HTTP method names must be tokens
	org.apache.coyote.http11.Http11InputBuffer.parseRequestLine(Http11InputBuffer.java:409)
	org.apache.coyote.http11.Http11Processor.service(Http11Processor.java:270)
	org.apache.coyote.AbstractProcessorLight.process(AbstractProcessorLight.java:63)
	org.apache.coyote.AbstractProtocol$ConnectionHandler.process(AbstractProtocol.java:905)
	org.apache.tomcat.util.net.NioEndpoint$SocketProcessor.doRun(NioEndpoint.java:1743)
	org.apache.tomcat.util.net.SocketProcessorBase.run(SocketProcessorBase.java:52)
	org.apache.tomcat.util.threads.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1190)
	org.apache.tomcat.util.threads.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:659)
	org.apache.tomcat.util.threads.TaskThread$WrappingRunnable.run(TaskThread.java:63)
	java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:1575)

Note The full stack trace of the root cause is available in the server logs.

Apache Tomcat/10.1.36

info.name: SNMPv3 Fingerprint - Detect
author: matejsmycka
info.description: SNMPv3 can leak information about the device even without proper authentication.Use `nmap -sU <ADDRESS> -p 161 --script snmp-info` to get more information.Engine IDs can help to determine one device with multiple interfaces.

response: Enterprise: unknown

info.name: Springboot Env Actuator - Detect
author: that_juan_
dwisiswant0
wdahlenb
philippedelteil
stupidfish
info.description: Sensitive environment variables may not be masked

info.name: Tomcat Detection
author: philippedelteil
dhiyaneshdk
adamcrosser
info.description: If an Tomcat instance is deployed on the target URL, when we send a request for a non existent resource we receive a Tomcat error page with version.

request:
GET /WebGoat/%5C HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:8082
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_12_6) AppleWebKit/603.3.8 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/10.1.2 Safari/603.3.8
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Cookie: JSESSIONID=504B0F1603D379839D241B3E82FC0859
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 400 Connection: close Content-Length: 796 Content-Language: en Content-Type: text/html;charset=utf-8 Date: Sat, 28 Feb 2026 20:48:51 GMT HTTP Status 400 – Bad Request

HTTP Status 400 – Bad Request

Type Status Report

Message Invalid URI

Description The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, invalid request message framing, or deceptive request routing).

Apache Tomcat/10.1.36
curl-command: curl -X 'GET' -d '' -H 'Accept: */*' -H 'Accept-Language: en' -H 'Cookie: JSESSIONID=504B0F1603D379839D241B3E82FC0859' -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_12_6) AppleWebKit/603.3.8 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/10.1.2 Safari/603.3.8' 'http://localhost:8082/WebGoat/%5C'

Connection: close

Accept-Encoding: gzip

GET /WebGoat HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:8082
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0, Win64, x64, rv:139.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/139.0
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Content-Language: en Content-Type: text/html;charset=UTF-8 Date: Sat, 28 Feb 2026 20:48:53 GMT Login Page
WebGoat


or register yourself as a new user
curl-command: curl -X 'GET' -d '' -H 'Accept: */*' -H 'Accept-Language: en' -H 'Cookie: JSESSIONID=2D306AE1E01FABB4EBC6A9D285F9080A' -H 'Referer: http://localhost:8082/WebGoat/' -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0, Win64, x64, rv:139.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/139.0' 'http://localhost:8082/WebGoat/login'

info.name: Wordpress Plugin Detection
author: s4e-io
info.description: Detects installed WordPress plugins by analyzing HTTP responses and common plugin paths

request:
GET /WebGoat HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:8082
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Ubuntu; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/140.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Content-Language: en Content-Type: text/html;charset=UTF-8 Date: Sat, 28 Feb 2026 20:48:52 GMT Login Page
WebGoat


or register yourself as a new user
curl-command: curl -X 'GET' -d '' -H 'Accept: */*' -H 'Accept-Language: en' -H 'Cookie: JSESSIONID=6B1A786011EBD96B3812FD63F435F358' -H 'Referer: http://localhost:8082/WebGoat/' -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Ubuntu; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/140.0.0.0 Safari/537.36' 'http://localhost:8082/WebGoat/login'

info.name: Missing Cookie SameSite Strict
author: lucky0x0d
pulsesecurity.co.nz
info.description: Identified cookies that lacked the samesite=strict attribute, which prevented enforcement of restrictions on cross-domain cookie transmission.

request:
GET /WebGoat HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:8082
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Ubuntu; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/140.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 302 
Connection: close
Date: Sat, 28 Feb 2026 20:48:52 GMT
Location: http://localhost:8082/WebGoat/login
Set-Cookie: JSESSIONID=6B1A786011EBD96B3812FD63F435F358; Path=/WebGoat; HttpOnly
Content-Length: 0
curl-command: curl -X 'GET' -d '' -H 'Accept: */*' -H 'Accept-Language: en' -H 'Cookie: JSESSIONID=6B1A786011EBD96B3812FD63F435F358' -H 'Referer: http://localhost:8082/WebGoat/' -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Ubuntu; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/140.0.0.0 Safari/537.36' 'http://localhost:8082/WebGoat/login'

info.name: Tomcat Stack Traces Enabled
author: lucky0x0d
info.description: Examine whether Tomcat stack traces are turned on by employing a designated problematic pattern.

request:
GET /WebGoat/?f=\[ HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:8082
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/74.0.3729.169 Safari/537.36
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 400 Connection: close Content-Length: 2031 Content-Language: en Content-Type: text/html;charset=utf-8 Date: Sat, 28 Feb 2026 20:49:00 GMT HTTP Status 400 – Bad Request

HTTP Status 400 – Bad Request

Type Exception Report

Message Invalid character found in the request target [/WebGoat/?f=\[ ]. The valid characters are defined in RFC 7230 and RFC 3986

Description The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, invalid request message framing, or deceptive request routing).

Exception

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Invalid character found in the request target [/WebGoat/?f=\[ ]. The valid characters are defined in RFC 7230 and RFC 3986
	org.apache.coyote.http11.Http11InputBuffer.parseRequestLine(Http11InputBuffer.java:484)
	org.apache.coyote.http11.Http11Processor.service(Http11Processor.java:270)
	org.apache.coyote.AbstractProcessorLight.process(AbstractProcessorLight.java:63)
	org.apache.coyote.AbstractProtocol$ConnectionHandler.process(AbstractProtocol.java:905)
	org.apache.tomcat.util.net.NioEndpoint$SocketProcessor.doRun(NioEndpoint.java:1743)
	org.apache.tomcat.util.net.SocketProcessorBase.run(SocketProcessorBase.java:52)
	org.apache.tomcat.util.threads.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1190)
	org.apache.tomcat.util.threads.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:659)
	org.apache.tomcat.util.threads.TaskThread$WrappingRunnable.run(TaskThread.java:63)
	java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:1575)

Note The full stack trace of the root cause is available in the server logs.

Apache Tomcat/10.1.36
curl-command: curl -X 'GET' -d '' -H 'Accept: */*' -H 'Accept-Language: en' -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/74.0.3729.169 Safari/537.36' 'http://localhost:8082/WebGoat/?f=\['
